title: De Blasio cancels NYC Pride March, non-essential June events: 'We will find the right way to do it'
description: During a press conference, NYC Mayor Bill de Blasio announces that three major non-essential June events are cancelled due to the coronavirus, one of them the 50th NYC Pride March.
content:
Mayor Bill de Blasio says New York City is in desperate need of surgical gowns
Mayor Bill de Blasio said Monday that New York City is in desperate need of surgical gowns.
De Blasio said the city did not have enough gowns to get through the week.
